page.title: 17MOVING OUT OF MOELFRE
page.content: We moved to Moelfre from Bristol when I was two because my father found a job here as a clerk. I have been living here for eight years and I have made a lot of friends. My brother was born here. We both speak Welsh, but our parents do not. We are moving from Moelfre because my dad is getting a better job with his insurance company. I was going to go to Amlwch Comprehensive school, but now I have to go to another school in Wrexham. I am looking forward to going although I shall miss my friends. Elizabeth Griffiths.
